scripts.browser: browserify lib/index.js -o js/markdown-template.js && browserify test/index.js -o test/test.js && npm run lint
scripts.test: npm run spec && npm run lint
scripts.lint: jshint lib/anchor.js lib/build.js lib/collapse.js lib/compile.js lib/figure.js lib/punctuation.js lib/abbrev.js lib/templates.js lib/section.js lib/social.js lib/toc.js lib/util.js lib/index.js test/index.js && standard lib/anchor.js lib/build.js lib/collapse.js lib/compile.js lib/figure.js lib/punctuation.js lib/section.js lib/social.js lib/abbrev.js lib/templates.js lib/toc.js lib/util.js lib/index.js test/index.js && markdownlint index.txt
scripts.commit: git --no-pager status && git --no-pager diff && git commit -a -m "Updated `git status | sed -n '/modified:/ {s/^[[:space:]]*modified:[[:space:]]*//;s/\.txt$//;s/\.md$//;s/\.html$//;s/\/index$//;p;q;}'`"
scripts.amend: git --no-pager status && git --no-pager diff && git commit -a --amend --no-edit
scripts.reword: git --no-pager status && git --no-pager diff && git commit -a --amend
scripts.push: git --no-pager status && git pull && git push
